ingredients: 1/2 (16 ounce) package frozen broccoli, carrots and cauliflower combination
recipe.title: Homemade Dog Food

ingredients: 1 2/3 cups fresh cilantro (from about 1/2 bunch), long, thick stems removed
2 tablespoons finely grated lime zest (from about 3 medium limes)
1/4 cup freshly squeezed lime juice (from about 3 medium limes)
2 cups  quinoa , any color or variety
1 1/3 cups vegetable stock or low-sodium vegetable broth
1 teaspoon  kosher salt , plus more as needed
recipe.title: Spicy Thai Coconut Quinoa Recipe

ingredients: 5 cups raw broccoli, cut into small florets and stems
2/3 cup sliced or slivered almonds, toasted
Optional toppings: slivered basil, fire oil (optional)**, sliced avocado
recipe.title: Double Broccoli Quinoa
